title: AngularJS projects
desc_long: Developed some angularjs projects like a Gmail Clone and a Portfolio Gallery using angularjs concepts like directives, controllers, templates, routing

title: WCF RESTful Web Services
desc: RESTful web services for a Car Insurance database company
desc_long: Created a WCF RESTful services in C# which can perform CRUD operations using HTTP verbs like GET, POST, PUT and DELETE. Used XML parsing for sending and updating data from the XML document. Also created a web application to test the web services
skills: RESTful web services, ASP.NET, C#, WCF, XML, LINQ

title: GeoSpatial Operations
desc_long: A JAVA library using Apache Spark and Hadoop on distributed clusters to run geometric operations like geometric union, spatial join, and closest pair on large dataset and analyzed the performance.

title: Secure Chat room
desc: A secure chat system with mutiple private and public rooms
desc_long: Implemented a secure chat application which allow user to create a chat room using a secure infrastructure. Used JAVA RMI framework to establish a remote connection between clients and server and used AES encryption.
skills: Java swing and RMI framework, AES encryption

title: FSK CallerID Decoder
desc_long: Caller ID is a telephone service, that transmits a caller's number to the called party's telephone equipment during the ringing signal. Modulation technique used for transmittinf Caller ID is either FSK or DTMF. FSK CallerID Decoding, demodulatess and decode the caller ID signal coming from the telephone jack and gives the Caller ID message.
skills: C/C++, Linux, Smartphone, API, Digital Signal Programming

title: LeetCode Problems
desc_long: Solved some easy to hard level data structures and algorithms problem from leetcode in C++. It includes LinkedList, Binary tree, Math, Recursive, Back tracking and Dynamic Programming
skills: Data structures and algorithms, C++ and Java

title: Embedded Software
desc_long: This includes some of my embedded software projects which I implemented during my Masters studies like RTOS Shared queue, Flight Simulator using Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU), Inter-Processor Communication, I2C Driver for an EEPROM chip and an Automatic Parking Indicator
skills: Linux Device Drive, Kernel programing, C/C++, Sensor Integration, Intel Galileo board, bus communication protocols like I2C, SPI, and  USART, Multithreaded programing, POSIX, Synchronization, Linux OS, Kalman Filter

title: Video Retrival
desc: Retrieve Similar videos frome database using motion estimation
desc_long: Implemented a Content Based Video Retrieval algorithm by extracting low level features like motion vectors in MATLAB. The feature vectors were extracted using Ce Liu's optical flow implementation for motion estimation and motion segmentation. To classify the videos in the data-set k-means clustering technique was used. A ranking system was also developed using min heap.
skills: Video processing, MATLAB, motion estimation and segmentation, K-means Clustering, C++
